title: Dem Boyz in Blue
description: Dem Boyz in Blue is about young African American undercover police officers. The story will show them trying to make a difference in their community, but in order to make a difference they must go down a road that could either destroy them or make them stronger. The reader will have a front row seat as they struggle to do the right thing on the job and in their personal lives. Their journey will take them to the brink of death as they move further into the world of an evil drug dealer. They will be challenged to make the right decision before crossing the thin blue line between right and wrong. This story will show the other side of the men who take an oath to protect and serve the people. Put on your seat belt and let the journey begin with Dem Boyz in Blue.
author: Bobby Rodgers
